title-part.text: WORKING OR PROCESSING OF METAL WIRE

CPC-specific-text.text: reducing diameter by

reference.text: rolling of metal B21B; by drawing, auxiliary operations used in connection with metal-working without essentially removing material B21C; bundling articles B65B13/00

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Wire working characterised by operations performed

CPC-specific-text.text: by means of manually operated devices, e.g. pliers
by means of press-type tooling
in 3D with means to rotate the tools about the wire axis

externally on a mandrel or the like
to spirals other than flat, e.g. conical
